items.label: 58911e9d5457a3215e3dbec0
items.name: Residential Season Service, RSS-1
items.description:
To residential customers in a single dwelling house, a mobile home, or individually metered single apartment unit or other  unit having housekeeping facilities, occupied by one family or household as a residence.  The premises of such single dwelling may include an additional apartment with separate housekeeping facilities, as well as a garage and other separate structures where they are occupied or used solely by the members or servants of such family or household.  Also, for energy used in commonly-owned facilities in condominium. Applicable to customers receiving residential service under Rate Schedule RS-1, RSL-1 or RSL-2 that meet the special provisions of this schedule.
Residential Seasonal Service (RSS-1)
You can reduce your customer charge from $8.76 per month to $4.58 per month
if you are gone for at least three months during the billing periods of March through
October and do not use more than 210 kWh per month (or 7 kWh per day). All other
charges as stated in otherwise applicable rate schedules still apply.
items.energycomments: Rate = Energy charge + Fuel charge, Adjustments = Asset Securitization charge + Energy Conservation + Environmental + Purchased Power Capacity (including Nuclear Cost Recovery clause)
